message: Hi Bob, I'm happy to offer you this product for $9,500. I believe it will be very valuable to you, and this price reflects its worth.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $8,500. I believe that's a fair price for the product.
Bob, I understand your perspective, but $8,500 is too low for the value this product offers.  I'm willing to come down slightly to $9,000. This feels like a fair compromise.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but I'm still a bit above $8,000. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $8,750. I believe that's a fair price for the product.
